person_say: I’ve been really stressed lately, the exam is coming up, and I can’t focus on studying. Is there a quick way to relax?
animal_say: I hear you! Stress can be tough, but I know a wise bear, Bruno, who can help you relax. Want to meet him?

person_say: Yes, meeting Bruno sounds wonderful! I would love to get some relaxing advice from him.
animal_say: Fantastic! Bruno will share some calming techniques to help ease your stress. Let's go find him!
